medical_history.chief_complaint: Difficulty with weight gain despite an active lifestyle and regular exercise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Weight gain has become noticeable in the past year, approximately 12 lb (5.4 kg) more than at her visit 2 years ago, despite a consistent exercise regimen of biking and swimming and adherence to a nutritious diet.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) characterized by irregular menses, facial acne, and mild hirsutism.
medical_history.family_history: Father developed diabetes in his 60s; mother has a history of deep venous thrombosis (DVT).
medical_history.social_history: Works as an administrator and project manager, is sexually active with 1 male partner, and does not smoke or use recreational drugs or alcohol.
